extends BSP<K1,V1,K2,V2,org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable>
    A BSP that can communicate via pipes with other programming languages and runtimes.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup(BSPPeer<K1,V1,K2,V2,org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable> peer)
             throws IOException
        This method is called after the BSP method. It can be used for cleanup purposes. Cleanup is guranteed to be called after the BSP runs, even in case of exceptions.
        Specified by:
